description: This file defines a Spring Data JPA repository interface for accessing GrievanceEntity records related to grievances in the airport facility service platform.

classes.name: GrievanceRepository
classes.description: A Spring Data JPA repository interface for managing GrievanceEntity objects, providing built-in methods and a custom finder for grievances by passenger ID.

methods.name: findByPassengerIdOrderByCreatedAtDesc
methods.description: Retrieves a list of grievances associated with a specific passenger ID, ordered by creation date descending.
